Method Detail

getConcreteComponentInstance

public java.lang.Object getConcreteComponentInstance(java.lang.Object proxy)
Description copied from interface: LazyComponentFactory
This method will return a concrete instance of the component registered with this factory. The component instance indentity is implementation dependent. This method will throw a runtime exception if invoked prior to registering an implementation for the component. This method is intended to be invoked by hollow instances (proxies) of the component.

Specified by:
getConcreteComponentInstance in interface LazyComponentFactory
Overrides:
getConcreteComponentInstance in class LazyComponentFactoryDecorator

This method will return a concrete instance of the component registered with this factory. The component instance indentity is implementation dependent. This method will throw a runtime exception if invoked prior to registering an implementation for the component.

Overrides:

returnComponentInstance

public void returnComponentInstance(java.lang.Object comp)
Description copied from interface: ComponentFactory
This method should be used to return a component instance obtained via ComponentFactory.getComponentInstance(). This method is primarily used for returning pooled components.

Specified by:
returnComponentInstance in interface ComponentFactory
Overrides:
returnComponentInstance in class LazyComponentFactoryDecorator
